name: Shitty Multiplayer FPS Playground for Unity 2021(using MLAPI)
name_original: Shitty Multiplayer FPS Playground for Unity 2021(using MLAPI)
description:
This is an experimental Multiplayer FPS Prototype, based on the newest system of Unity networking called: "MLAPI", which is completly free. It is very strongly under development, so don't expect to much. Right now it will be very tricky for you, to run the game, because you will have to change many custom setting in Unity and set countless referencess. So better don't try it if you aren't ready for a big challenge.

All of you are free to use my Code and Graphics. Most of the Code is teached from the YouTuber: "Brackeys"                        The Playlist I used is below.

The Graphics are either from the Unity Asset Store, or from devassets.com also from Brackeys.

So have fun with this crap!

Unity verson 2021.1.13f1 is recommended, for this "game"
